info.title: CSF Healthcare
info.description: CSF Healthcare api documentation for users

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: (OPTIONAL if user is logging in) (REQUIRED if user is getting registered)

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: (OPTIONAL if user is logging in) (REQUIRED if user is getting registered)

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: (OPTIONAL if user is logging in) (REQUIRED if user is getting registered)

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId is required (userId received from socialLogin API)

parameters.name: professionalSubSpeciality
parameters.description: Professional Sub Speciality [Add multiple ids using double quotes]

parameters.name: services
parameters.description: Services - These are subspecialities [Add multiple ids using double quotes]

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: Multiple image object [Add multiple images using double quotes]

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type is required [1 - Update user information and add role to 'role' array, 2 - Just update defaultLoginRole]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Service/Speciality/subspeciality id is required [Service id if type=2, speciality id if type=1 and subspeciality id if type=3]

parameters.name: facilityId
parameters.description: Optional - to get list of professionals of a Facility

parameters.name: lastId
parameters.description: DONT USE THIS PARAMETER NOW  - lastId is required for pagination only

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: skip is required for pagination only

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: count is required for pagination only

parameters.name: lastId
parameters.description: lastId is required for pagination only

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: count is required for pagination only

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: role is required - USER / PROFESSIONAL / FACILITY

parameters.name: addressId
parameters.description: OPTIONAL - addressId is required to update address

parameters.name: checkFolders
parameters.description: OPTIONAL [0-folders list by access token, 1 - folders list by user Id]

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: OPTIONAL [userId is required in case of getting other user's folder list ie checkFolders='1']

fileType.description: File type is required - [Documents / Photos / Video / Audio / Links / Custom]

doctor.description: doctor/professional id [Optional - id of doctor in case file is sent by a doctor]

dependentId.description: Dependent id in case file upload is for dependent

parameters.name: folderType
parameters.description: folderType is required only for custom folders

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: working hours array like [{'Working':true,'startTime':'12:30 AM','endTime':'05:00 PM'}]

parameters.name: serviceCategory
parameters.description: id of service category of professional

parameters.name: lastId
parameters.description: lastId is required for pagination only

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: count is required for pagination only

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type is required [1- total revenue and partners total revenue count ,2 - follower's total transactions and total amount]

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: userId [required in case professional wants to get list of dependents of a patient]

parameters.name: lastId
parameters.description: lastId is required for pagination only

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: count is required for pagination only

parameters.description: lastId is required for pagination only

parameters.description: count is required for pagination only

parameters.description: lastId is required for pagination only

parameters.description: count is required for pagination only
